caption.p:
Fluctuation functions (solid) for CMIP5 AR5 models. The respective crossover time scales present are ( a) 13 days, 340 days, 7.2 years (stars);( b) 9 days, 372 days (stars); ( c) 10 days, 331 days, 818 days (stars); ( d) 10 days, 359 days, 793 days (stars); ( e) member 1: 335 days, 703 days (stars); member 2: 55 days, 331 days, 785 days (diamonds); ( f) 8 days, 333 days, 4.8 years (stars). The dashed line (orange) denotes a slope of
. (Online version in colour.)
